// src/services/signalRConnection.js
import*as signalR from'@microsoft/signalr';const connection=new signalR.HubConnectionBuilder().withUrl("http://localhost:5090/chathub").withAutomaticReconnect().build();async function startConnection(){if(connection.state===signalR.HubConnectionState.Disconnected){try{await connection.start();console.log("SignalR Connected.");}catch(err){console.error("Connection failed: ",err);await new Promise(resolve=>setTimeout(resolve,2000));return startConnection();}}return connection;}export{connection,startConnection};
